Variable.name: date_time
Description: Date and time of observation (if known)

Variable.name: unique_location_id
Description: Concatenated SiteID, elevation, aspect, and PlotID

Variable.name: day_night
Description: Whether the measurement was performed as part of a daytime or nighttime flux campaign

Variable.name: flux_type
Description: Which flux was measured or calculated, including cue (carbon-use efficiency), evap_day (daytime evaporation), evap_night (nighttime evaporation), evapotrans (evapotranspiration), gpp (gross primary productivity), nee (net ecosystem exchange), npp (net primary productivity), resp_day (daytime ecosystem respiration), resp_night (nighttime ecosystem respiration), soil_evap (soil evaporation), soil_resp (soil respiration), transpiration (ecosystem transpiration), wue (water-use efficiency)

Variable.name: clean_flux_type
Description: Full name and units of the flux
Variable range or levels:
Carbon Use Efficiency
(GPP/NPP) - Water Use Efficiency
(Transpiration/NPP)

Variable.name: device
Description: What equipment was used to measure the microclimate value
